story.storykicker: Check out what the stars say your day will be like today.
story.storybody:
ARIES{mosimage}

Financial investments and business plans prove to be lucrative. Your plans seem to be matching with divine plans now and actualize in an unexpected and magical way. Patience and persistence are necessary for opportunities to manifest and plans to fructify. Lucky number 1. Colour green.

TAURUS{mosimage}

You demand balance and freedom in partnerships or lose interest in them. You are intuitive and creative, gaining respect and friendship of people. There is likely to be temporary alternation - increase and decrease in business and fluctuation in finances. Lucky number 2. Colour blue.

GEMINI{mosimage}

A positive and detached attitude helps to turn relationships around in a surprising way. Disruption at work is temporary, as there is an acceleration of profit and production at the end of the day. Visit your doctor, as health problems should not be neglected. Lucky number 7. Colour blue.

CANCER{mosimage}

You look at priorities before moving into new opportunities today. You are ripe and ready for a residential or professional change. Ego stands should be avoided as they only lead to trouble and conflict. Love and romance add spice to an action packed day. Lucky number 16. Colour orange.

LEO{mosimage}

Balance is advisable in professional matters today. You are focused and clear about your goals. Great expectations bring disappointment! Take life as it comes and go with the flow. Commitments are best put on hold till you are certain about the other's feelings. Lucky number 5. Colour yellow.

VIRGO{mosimage}

Inception of new ventures is favorable today! A more relaxed and creative atmosphere encourages progress and growth. A new approach to an old problem can be the ultimate solution. It's a good time to make changes at home and at work to bring fresh energy. Lucky number 8. Colour white.

LIBRA{mosimage}

Family and friends gather around to share happy times. Success and good fortune in projects is assured. Beware of waste, dissipation and laziness. Aesthetic and creative pastimes can be satisfying. Women and children play significant and positive roles today. Lucky number 3. Colour pink.

SCORPIO{mosimage}

You go beyond illusions and look realistically at situations. Clarity and commitment in the future are based on what you decide now. The Sun is waiting to shine through the dark night of the Moon and bring positive energy. Answers are revealed to you. Lucky number 18. Colour blues.

SAGITTARIUS{mosimage}

A variety of negative ideas causes your confidence to diminish. Make a priority list and follow it with resolve and inner clarity. Redecorating home or office brings fresh energy and ambiance. A positive and creative approach resolves your problems today. Lucky number 7. Colour white.

CAPRICORN{mosimage}

You move with lighthearted ease towards new dimensions and creative opportunities. Professional aspects and business routines move smoothly with a momentum of their own. You are gentle and romantic in personal relationships. Don't allow old fears to get you. Lucky number 7. Colour pink.

AQUARIUS{mosimage}

You make swift decisions, and act quickly to avail of opportunities. You are proud but generous with loved ones. You are dynamic and make ripples in the waters around you, some will feel uplifted and refreshed by your presence and others may feel threatened. Lucky number 5. Colour red.

PISCES{mosimage}

Patience is a virtue today. You feel dominated by people in control as they use their authority to delay matters. You tend to get restless when things don't go your way. Personal relationships are loving and supportive. It is time to be light and playful. Lucky number 2. Colour crimson.
